title: Kia Whakamōhiotia - Te Orbital Temple
heading: Kia Whakamōhiotia Ina Whakatika
description:
Hei te 28 o Noema 2025, ka piki te Temepara Orbital.
Waiho to ī-mēra, ma matou e korero ki a koe ina tae ki te waahi.

form.successMessage: Ka tae atu ki a koe ina kake.
form.errorMessage: Kua he tetahi. Me ngana ano.
